item.description:
Spring Paella
Cooking Class
Barcelona New Haven
Tuesday, March 12th, 7pm

Join Executive Chef Frank Proto as he shows you the secrets to a Spanish classic--paella. We will make two variations of our Barcelona paella, one with game and one with seafood (and there is a vegetarian option).


"Everyone's in charge of calling 203.848.3000to make their own reservation."

This sounds like a wonderful time.....Everything done at Barcelona is done with Class!!!!!

Anyone going has to RSVP to the restaurant at least 24 hours before and can pay when they get there for the class

http://www.barcelonawinebar.com/calendar.htm

$25 per person, plus tax and gratuity
Please call 203.848.3000 for reservations
item.name: Spring Paella Cooking Class at Barcelona
